hooks.command:
if ! curl -s --connect-timeout 1 http://localhost:8102 >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo -e '

\033[1;31mCannot reach backend on port 8102! Please run `pnpm run dev` before querying Claude Code\033[0m

' >&2; exit 2; fi
jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | { read file_path; if [[ "$file_path" =~ \.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$ ]]; then pnpm run lint --fix "$file_path" || true; fi }
(pnpm run typecheck 1>&2 || exit 2) && (pnpm run lint 1>&2 || exit 2)
